answers.answer: With my first pregnancy(my son)....i was really sick for the first trimester then only occasionally throughout the rest of the pregnancy and i wanted sweets all the time! I ended up having gestational diabetes :( (hopefully i wont have it this time)...Now i havent been sick at all...nauseous here and there but nothing like my last. And the thought of sweets just grosses me out! So weird! I dont really have a lot of an appitite this time either. I dont feel pregnent yet :/

With my first i was nauseous on and off but nothing crazy.  This time around I am nauseous all the time and have recently been experiencing morning sickness and the feel just won't go away! Needles to say I'm not into food this round (yet!) :)

With my first I was nauseous all day during my first trimester.  Couldn't keep anything down and had to be put on medication for it. I also slept most of the day to avoid feeling sick. Now with this pregnancy I feel great! Some minor fatigue but no nausea.

With both my boys I was never sick! Just wasn't hungry too much and certain food chicken grossed me out but nothing too too crazy besides that. I also didn't show till I was 5/6 months preg.This one however I'm constantly nauceous, sick dizzy, headaches everything super tired all the symptoms you can possibly get!! I'm also showing at 8 weeks. So different everyone is saying I'm having a girl but you never know!

question: With my son I hated sweets! With this one I want them all the time. With my son I would get sick maybe once or twice a day and then feel fine but this time I'm like constantly nauseous! What are some of the differences for you ladies?
title: differences between pregnancies
